t: The Perfect Minecraft LEGO Set for Halloween Is Retiring Soon, But It's Still Discounted on Amazon - IGN
s: October 18, 2024 - You take a game all about building ... to a toy brand that is all about building with bricks and you have a winning combination. While there are a lot of great LEGO Minecraft sets available, some of them are actually about to be retired. One of these sets that the LEGO website has as "Retiring soon" is the Minecraft Pumpkin Farm that happens to still be on sale at Amazon this October.
